title: Amazon SNS to Kinesis Firehose to OpenSearch Dashboard
description: This pattern deploys infrastructure that utilizes Kinesis Firehose to deliver messages sent to an SNS topic to Amazon OpenSearch.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: Messages are sent to an SNS topic, and SNS fans out the messages to a Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream. Firehose then streams and delivers the messages to OpenSearch, where the streaming data is loaded and indexed for analysis and searching. Additionally, failed data is backed up using an S3 bucket.
